data.textUthmani: قَدْ أَفْلَحَ ٱلْمُؤْمِنُونَ
data.wordByWord: قَدْ [Indeed] أَفْلَحَ [successful] ٱلْمُؤْمِنُونَ [(are) the believers]
data.transliteration: Qad aflaha almu/minoon

data.textUthmani: ٱلَّذِينَ هُمْ فِى صَلَاتِهِمْ خَـٰشِعُونَ
data.wordByWord: ٱلَّذِينَ [Those who] هُمْ [[they]] فِى [during] صَلَاتِهِمْ [their prayers] خَـٰشِعُونَ [(are) humbly submissive]
data.transliteration: Allatheena hum fee salatihimkhashiAAoon

data.textUthmani: وَٱلَّذِينَ هُمْ عَنِ ٱللَّغْوِ مُعْرِضُونَ
data.wordByWord: وَٱلَّذِينَ [Those who] هُمْ [[they]] عَنِ [from] ٱللَّغْوِ [the vain talk] مُعْرِضُونَ [turn away]
data.transliteration: Wallatheena hum AAani allaghwimuAAridoon

data.textUthmani: وَٱلَّذِينَ هُمْ لِلزَّكَوٰةِ فَـٰعِلُونَ
data.wordByWord: وَٱلَّذِينَ [Those who] هُمْ [[they]] لِلزَّكَوٰةِ [of purification works] فَـٰعِلُونَ [(are) doers]
data.transliteration: Wallatheena hum lizzakatifaAAiloon

data.textUthmani: وَٱلَّذِينَ هُمْ لِفُرُوجِهِمْ حَـٰفِظُونَ
data.wordByWord: وَٱلَّذِينَ [And those who] هُمْ [[they]] لِفُرُوجِهِمْ [of their modesty] حَـٰفِظُونَ [(are) guardians]
data.transliteration: Wallatheena hum lifuroojihim hafithoon

data.textUthmani: إِلَّا عَلَىٰٓ أَزْوَٰجِهِمْ أَوْ مَا مَلَكَتْ أَيْمَـٰنُهُمْ فَإِنَّهُمْ غَيْرُ مَلُومِينَ
data.wordByWord: إِلَّا [Except] عَلَىٰٓ [from] أَزْوَٰجِهِمْ [their spouses] أَوْ [or] مَا [what] مَلَكَتْ [possess] أَيْمَـٰنُهُمْ [their right hands] فَإِنَّهُمْ [then indeed, they] غَيْرُ [(are) not] مَلُومِينَ [blameworthy]
data.transliteration: Illa AAala azwajihim awma malakat aymanuhum fa-innahum ghayru maloomeen

data.textUthmani: فَمَنِ ٱبْتَغَىٰ وَرَآءَ ذَٰلِكَ فَأُو۟لَـٰٓئِكَ هُمُ ٱلْعَادُونَ
data.wordByWord: فَمَنِ [Then whoever] ٱبْتَغَىٰ [seeks] وَرَآءَ [beyond] ذَٰلِكَ [that] فَأُو۟لَـٰٓئِكَ [then those] هُمُ [[they]] ٱلْعَادُونَ [(are) the transgressors]
data.transliteration: Famani ibtagha waraa thalikafaola-ika humu alAAadoon

data.textUthmani: وَٱلَّذِينَ هُمْ لِأَمَـٰنَـٰتِهِمْ وَعَهْدِهِمْ رَٰعُونَ
data.wordByWord: وَٱلَّذِينَ [And those who] هُمْ [[they]] لِأَمَـٰنَـٰتِهِمْ [of their trusts] وَعَهْدِهِمْ [and their promise(s)] رَٰعُونَ [(are) observers]
data.transliteration: Wallatheena hum li-amanatihimwaAAahdihim raAAoon

data.textUthmani: وَٱلَّذِينَ هُمْ عَلَىٰ صَلَوَٰتِهِمْ يُحَافِظُونَ
data.wordByWord: وَٱلَّذِينَ [And those who] هُمْ [[they]] عَلَىٰ [over] صَلَوَٰتِهِمْ [their prayers] يُحَافِظُونَ [they guard]
data.transliteration: Wallatheena hum AAala salawatihimyuhafithoon

data.textUthmani: أُو۟لَـٰٓئِكَ هُمُ ٱلْوَٰرِثُونَ
data.wordByWord: أُو۟لَـٰٓئِكَ [Those] هُمُ [[they]] ٱلْوَٰرِثُونَ [(are) the inheritors]
data.transliteration: Ola-ika humu alwarithoon

data.textUthmani: ٱلَّذِينَ يَرِثُونَ ٱلْفِرْدَوْسَ هُمْ فِيهَا خَـٰلِدُونَ
data.wordByWord: ٱلَّذِينَ [Who] يَرِثُونَ [will inherit] ٱلْفِرْدَوْسَ [the Paradise] هُمْ [They] فِيهَا [therein] خَـٰلِدُونَ [(will) abide forever]
data.transliteration: Allatheena yarithoona alfirdawsa humfeeha khalidoon

data.textUthmani: وَلَقَدْ خَلَقْنَا ٱلْإِنسَـٰنَ مِن سُلَـٰلَةٍ مِّن طِينٍ
data.wordByWord: وَلَقَدْ [And indeed] خَلَقْنَا [We created] ٱلْإِنسَـٰنَ [the humankind] مِن [from] سُلَـٰلَةٍۢ [an essence] مِّن [of] طِينٍۢ [clay]
data.transliteration: Walaqad khalaqna al-insana minsulalatin min teen

data.textUthmani: ثُمَّ جَعَلْنَـٰهُ نُطْفَةً فِى قَرَارٍ مَّكِينٍ
data.wordByWord: ثُمَّ [Then] جَعَلْنَـٰهُ [We placed him] نُطْفَةًۭ [(as) a semen-drop] فِى [in] قَرَارٍۢ [a resting place] مَّكِينٍۢ [firm]
data.transliteration: Thumma jaAAalnahu nutfatan feeqararin makeen

data.textUthmani: ثُمَّ خَلَقْنَا ٱلنُّطْفَةَ عَلَقَةً فَخَلَقْنَا ٱلْعَلَقَةَ مُضْغَةً فَخَلَقْنَا ٱلْمُضْغَةَ عِظَـٰمًا فَكَسَوْنَا ٱلْعِظَـٰمَ لَحْمًا ثُمَّ أَنشَأْنَـٰهُ خَلْقًا ءَاخَرَ ۚ فَتَبَارَكَ ٱللَّهُ أَحْسَنُ ٱلْخَـٰلِقِينَ
data.wordByWord: ثُمَّ [Then] خَلَقْنَا [We created] ٱلنُّطْفَةَ [the semen-drop] عَلَقَةًۭ [(into) a clinging substance] فَخَلَقْنَا [then We created] ٱلْعَلَقَةَ [the clinging substance] مُضْغَةًۭ [(into) an embryonic lump] فَخَلَقْنَا [then We created] ٱلْمُضْغَةَ [the embryonic lump] عِظَـٰمًۭا [(into) bones] فَكَسَوْنَا [then We clothed] ٱلْعِظَـٰمَ [the bones] لَحْمًۭا [(with) flesh] ثُمَّ [then] أَنشَأْنَـٰهُ [We produce it] خَلْقًا [(as) a creation] ءَاخَرَ ۚ [another] فَتَبَارَكَ [So blessed is] ٱللَّهُ [Allah] أَحْسَنُ [(the) Best] ٱلْخَـٰلِقِينَ [(of) the Creators]
data.transliteration: Thumma khalaqna annutfataAAalaqatan fakhalaqna alAAalaqata mudghatanfakhalaqna almudghata AAithamanfakasawna alAAithama lahmanthumma ansha/nahu khalqan akhara fatabarakaAllahu ahsanu alkhaliqeen

data.textUthmani: ثُمَّ إِنَّكُم بَعْدَ ذَٰلِكَ لَمَيِّتُونَ
data.wordByWord: ثُمَّ [Then] إِنَّكُم [indeed, you] بَعْدَ [after] ذَٰلِكَ [that] لَمَيِّتُونَ [surely (will) die]
data.transliteration: Thumma innakum baAAda thalikalamayyitoon

data.textUthmani: ثُمَّ إِنَّكُمْ يَوْمَ ٱلْقِيَـٰمَةِ تُبْعَثُونَ
data.wordByWord: ثُمَّ [Then] إِنَّكُمْ [indeed, you] يَوْمَ [(on the) Day] ٱلْقِيَـٰمَةِ [(of) the Resurrection] تُبْعَثُونَ [will be resurrected]
data.transliteration: Thumma innakum yawma alqiyamatitubAAathoon

data.textUthmani: وَلَقَدْ خَلَقْنَا فَوْقَكُمْ سَبْعَ طَرَآئِقَ وَمَا كُنَّا عَنِ ٱلْخَلْقِ غَـٰفِلِينَ
data.wordByWord: وَلَقَدْ [And indeed] خَلَقْنَا [We (have) created] فَوْقَكُمْ [above you] سَبْعَ [seven] طَرَآئِقَ [paths] وَمَا [and not] كُنَّا [We are] عَنِ [of] ٱلْخَلْقِ [the creation] غَـٰفِلِينَ [unaware]
data.transliteration: Walaqad khalaqna fawqakum sabAAa tara-iqawama kunna AAani alkhalqi ghafileen

data.textUthmani: وَأَنزَلْنَا مِنَ ٱلسَّمَآءِ مَآءًۢ بِقَدَرٍ فَأَسْكَنَّـٰهُ فِى ٱلْأَرْضِ ۖ وَإِنَّا عَلَىٰ ذَهَابٍۭ بِهِۦ لَقَـٰدِرُونَ
data.wordByWord: وَأَنزَلْنَا [And We send down] مِنَ [from] ٱلسَّمَآءِ [the sky] مَآءًۢ [water] بِقَدَرٍۢ [in (due) measure] فَأَسْكَنَّـٰهُ [then We cause it to settle] فِى [in] ٱلْأَرْضِ ۖ [the earth] وَإِنَّا [And indeed, We] عَلَىٰ [on] ذَهَابٍۭ [taking it away] بِهِۦ [taking it away] لَقَـٰدِرُونَ [surely (are) Able]
data.transliteration: Waanzalna mina assama-imaan biqadarin faaskannahu fee al-ardiwa-inna AAala thahabin bihi laqadiroon

words.translation: then We cause it to settle

data.textUthmani: فَأَنشَأْنَا لَكُم بِهِۦ جَنَّـٰتٍ مِّن نَّخِيلٍ وَأَعْنَـٰبٍ لَّكُمْ فِيهَا فَوَٰكِهُ كَثِيرَةٌ وَمِنْهَا تَأْكُلُونَ
data.wordByWord: فَأَنشَأْنَا [Then We produced] لَكُم [for you] بِهِۦ [by it] جَنَّـٰتٍۢ [gardens] مِّن [of date-palms] نَّخِيلٍۢ [of date-palms] وَأَعْنَـٰبٍۢ [and grapevines] لَّكُمْ [for you] فِيهَا [in it] فَوَٰكِهُ [(are) fruits] كَثِيرَةٌۭ [abundant] وَمِنْهَا [and from them] تَأْكُلُونَ [you eat]
data.transliteration: Faansha/na lakum bihi jannatinmin nakheelin waaAAnabin lakum feeha fawakihukatheeratun waminha ta/kuloon

data.textUthmani: وَشَجَرَةً تَخْرُجُ مِن طُورِ سَيْنَآءَ تَنۢبُتُ بِٱلدُّهْنِ وَصِبْغٍ لِّلْـَٔاكِلِينَ
data.wordByWord: وَشَجَرَةًۭ [And a tree] تَخْرُجُ [(that) springs forth] مِن [from] طُورِ [Mount Sinai] سَيْنَآءَ [Mount Sinai] تَنۢبُتُ [(which) produces] بِٱلدُّهْنِ [oil] وَصِبْغٍۢ [and a relish] لِّلْـَٔاكِلِينَ [for those who eat]
data.transliteration: Washajaratan takhruju min toori saynaatanbutu bidduhni wasibghin lilakileen

data.textUthmani: وَإِنَّ لَكُمْ فِى ٱلْأَنْعَـٰمِ لَعِبْرَةً ۖ نُّسْقِيكُم مِّمَّا فِى بُطُونِهَا وَلَكُمْ فِيهَا مَنَـٰفِعُ كَثِيرَةٌ وَمِنْهَا تَأْكُلُونَ
data.wordByWord: وَإِنَّ [And indeed] لَكُمْ [for you] فِى [in] ٱلْأَنْعَـٰمِ [the cattle] لَعِبْرَةًۭ ۖ [surely, (is) a lesson] نُّسْقِيكُم [We give you drink] مِّمَّا [from what] فِى [(is) in] بُطُونِهَا [their bellies] وَلَكُمْ [and for you] فِيهَا [in them] مَنَـٰفِعُ [(are) benefits] كَثِيرَةٌۭ [many] وَمِنْهَا [and of them] تَأْكُلُونَ [you eat]
data.transliteration: Wa-inna lakum fee al-anAAamilaAAibratan nusqeekum mimma fee butoonihawalakum feeha manafiAAu katheeratun waminhata/kuloon

data.textUthmani: وَعَلَيْهَا وَعَلَى ٱلْفُلْكِ تُحْمَلُونَ
data.wordByWord: وَعَلَيْهَا [And on them] وَعَلَى [and on] ٱلْفُلْكِ [[the] ships] تُحْمَلُونَ [you are carried]
data.transliteration: WaAAalayha waAAala alfulki tuhmaloon

data.textUthmani: وَلَقَدْ أَرْسَلْنَا نُوحًا إِلَىٰ قَوْمِهِۦ فَقَالَ يَـٰقَوْمِ ٱعْبُدُوا۟ ٱللَّهَ مَا لَكُم مِّنْ إِلَـٰهٍ غَيْرُهُۥٓ ۖ أَفَلَا تَتَّقُونَ
data.wordByWord: وَلَقَدْ [And verily] أَرْسَلْنَا [We sent] نُوحًا [Nuh] إِلَىٰ [to] قَوْمِهِۦ [his people] فَقَالَ [and he said] يَـٰقَوْمِ [O my people] ٱعْبُدُوا۟ [Worship] ٱللَّهَ [Allah] مَا [not] لَكُم [for you] مِّنْ [(is) any] إِلَـٰهٍ [god] غَيْرُهُۥٓ ۖ [other than Him] أَفَلَا [Then will not] تَتَّقُونَ [you fear]
data.transliteration: Walaqad arsalna noohan ilaqawmihi faqala ya qawmi oAAbudoo Allaha malakum min ilahin ghayruhu afala tattaqoon

data.textUthmani: فَقَالَ ٱلْمَلَؤُا۟ ٱلَّذِينَ كَفَرُوا۟ مِن قَوْمِهِۦ مَا هَـٰذَآ إِلَّا بَشَرٌ مِّثْلُكُمْ يُرِيدُ أَن يَتَفَضَّلَ عَلَيْكُمْ وَلَوْ شَآءَ ٱللَّهُ لَأَنزَلَ مَلَـٰٓئِكَةً مَّا سَمِعْنَا بِهَـٰذَا فِىٓ ءَابَآئِنَا ٱلْأَوَّلِينَ
data.wordByWord: فَقَالَ [But said] ٱلْمَلَؤُا۟ [the chiefs] ٱلَّذِينَ [(of) those who] كَفَرُوا۟ [disbelieved] مِن [among] قَوْمِهِۦ [his people] مَا [This is not] هَـٰذَآ [This is not] إِلَّا [but] بَشَرٌۭ [a man] مِّثْلُكُمْ [like you] يُرِيدُ [he wishes] أَن [to] يَتَفَضَّلَ [assert (his) superiority] عَلَيْكُمْ [over you] وَلَوْ [and if] شَآءَ [Allah had willed] ٱللَّهُ [Allah had willed] لَأَنزَلَ [surely He (would have) sent down] مَلَـٰٓئِكَةًۭ [Angels] مَّا [Not] سَمِعْنَا [we heard] بِهَـٰذَا [of this] فِىٓ [from] ءَابَآئِنَا [our forefathers] ٱلْأَوَّلِينَ [our forefathers]
data.transliteration: Faqala almalao allatheenakafaroo min qawmihi ma hatha illa basharunmithlukum yureedu an yatafaddala AAalaykum walaw shaaAllahu laanzala mala-ikatan ma samiAAnabihatha fee aba-ina al-awwaleen

data.textUthmani: إِنْ هُوَ إِلَّا رَجُلٌۢ بِهِۦ جِنَّةٌ فَتَرَبَّصُوا۟ بِهِۦ حَتَّىٰ حِينٍ
data.wordByWord: إِنْ [Not] هُوَ [he] إِلَّا [(is) but] رَجُلٌۢ [a man] بِهِۦ [in him] جِنَّةٌۭ [(is) madness] فَتَرَبَّصُوا۟ [so wait] بِهِۦ [concerning him] حَتَّىٰ [until] حِينٍۢ [a time]
data.transliteration: In huwa illa rajulun bihi jinnatunfatarabbasoo bihi hatta heen

data.textUthmani: قَالَ رَبِّ ٱنصُرْنِى بِمَا كَذَّبُونِ
data.wordByWord: قَالَ [He said] رَبِّ [My Lord] ٱنصُرْنِى [Help me] بِمَا [because] كَذَّبُونِ [they deny me]
data.transliteration: Qala rabbi onsurnee bimakaththaboon

data.textUthmani: فَأَوْحَيْنَآ إِلَيْهِ أَنِ ٱصْنَعِ ٱلْفُلْكَ بِأَعْيُنِنَا وَوَحْيِنَا فَإِذَا جَآءَ أَمْرُنَا وَفَارَ ٱلتَّنُّورُ ۙ فَٱسْلُكْ فِيهَا مِن كُلٍّ زَوْجَيْنِ ٱثْنَيْنِ وَأَهْلَكَ إِلَّا مَن سَبَقَ عَلَيْهِ ٱلْقَوْلُ مِنْهُمْ ۖ وَلَا تُخَـٰطِبْنِى فِى ٱلَّذِينَ ظَلَمُوٓا۟ ۖ إِنَّهُم مُّغْرَقُونَ
data.wordByWord: فَأَوْحَيْنَآ [So We inspired] إِلَيْهِ [to him] أَنِ [That] ٱصْنَعِ [construct] ٱلْفُلْكَ [the ship] بِأَعْيُنِنَا [under Our eyes] وَوَحْيِنَا [and Our inspiration] فَإِذَا [then when] جَآءَ [comes] أَمْرُنَا [Our Command] وَفَارَ [and gushes forth] ٱلتَّنُّورُ ۙ [the oven] فَٱسْلُكْ [then put] فِيهَا [into it] مِن [of] كُلٍّۢ [every (kind)] زَوْجَيْنِ [(of) mates] ٱثْنَيْنِ [two] وَأَهْلَكَ [and your family] إِلَّا [except] مَن [those] سَبَقَ [(has) preceded] عَلَيْهِ [against whom] ٱلْقَوْلُ [the Word] مِنْهُمْ ۖ [thereof] وَلَا [And (do) not] تُخَـٰطِبْنِى [address Me] فِى [concerning] ٱلَّذِينَ [those who] ظَلَمُوٓا۟ ۖ [wronged] إِنَّهُم [indeed, they] مُّغْرَقُونَ [(are) the ones to be drowned]
data.transliteration: Faawhayna ilayhi ani isnaAAialfulka bi-aAAyunina wawahyina fa-ithajaa amruna wafara attannooru faslukfeeha min kullin zawjayni ithnayni waahlaka illaman sabaqa AAalayhi alqawlu minhum wala tukhatibneefee allatheena thalamoo innahum mughraqoon

data.textUthmani: فَإِذَا ٱسْتَوَيْتَ أَنتَ وَمَن مَّعَكَ عَلَى ٱلْفُلْكِ فَقُلِ ٱلْحَمْدُ لِلَّهِ ٱلَّذِى نَجَّىٰنَا مِنَ ٱلْقَوْمِ ٱلظَّـٰلِمِينَ
data.wordByWord: فَإِذَا [And when] ٱسْتَوَيْتَ [you (have) boarded] أَنتَ [you] وَمَن [and whoever] مَّعَكَ [(is) with you] عَلَى [[on]] ٱلْفُلْكِ [the ship] فَقُلِ [then say] ٱلْحَمْدُ [Praise] لِلَّهِ [(be) to Allah] ٱلَّذِى [Who] نَجَّىٰنَا [(has) saved us] مِنَ [from] ٱلْقَوْمِ [the people ] ٱلظَّـٰلِمِينَ [the wrongdoers]
data.transliteration: Fa-itha istawayta anta waman maAAakaAAala alfulki faquli alhamdu lillahi allatheenajjana mina alqawmi aththalimeen

data.textUthmani: وَقُل رَّبِّ أَنزِلْنِى مُنزَلًا مُّبَارَكًا وَأَنتَ خَيْرُ ٱلْمُنزِلِينَ
data.wordByWord: وَقُل [And say] رَّبِّ [My Lord] أَنزِلْنِى [cause me to land] مُنزَلًۭا [(at) a landing place] مُّبَارَكًۭا [blessed] وَأَنتَ [and You] خَيْرُ [(are) the Best] ٱلْمُنزِلِينَ [(of) those who cause to land.']
data.transliteration: Waqul rabbi anzilnee munzalan mubarakanwaanta khayru almunzileen

data.textUthmani: إِنَّ فِى ذَٰلِكَ لَـَٔايَـٰتٍ وَإِن كُنَّا لَمُبْتَلِينَ
data.wordByWord: إِنَّ [Indeed] فِى [in] ذَٰلِكَ [that] لَـَٔايَـٰتٍۢ [surely (are) Signs] وَإِن [and indeed] كُنَّا [We are] لَمُبْتَلِينَ [surely testing]
data.transliteration: Inna fee thalika laayatinwa-in kunna lamubtaleen

data.textUthmani: ثُمَّ أَنشَأْنَا مِنۢ بَعْدِهِمْ قَرْنًا ءَاخَرِينَ
data.wordByWord: ثُمَّ [Then] أَنشَأْنَا [We produced] مِنۢ [after them] بَعْدِهِمْ [after them] قَرْنًا [a generation] ءَاخَرِينَ [another]
data.transliteration: Thumma ansha/na min baAAdihim qarnan akhareen

data.textUthmani: فَأَرْسَلْنَا فِيهِمْ رَسُولًا مِّنْهُمْ أَنِ ٱعْبُدُوا۟ ٱللَّهَ مَا لَكُم مِّنْ إِلَـٰهٍ غَيْرُهُۥٓ ۖ أَفَلَا تَتَّقُونَ
data.wordByWord: فَأَرْسَلْنَا [And We sent] فِيهِمْ [among them] رَسُولًۭا [a Messenger] مِّنْهُمْ [from themselves] أَنِ [[that]] ٱعْبُدُوا۟ [Worship] ٱللَّهَ [Allah] مَا [not] لَكُم [for you] مِّنْ [(is) any] إِلَـٰهٍ [god] غَيْرُهُۥٓ ۖ [other than Him] أَفَلَا [Then will not] تَتَّقُونَ [you fear]
data.transliteration: Faarsalna feehim rasoolan minhum anioAAbudoo Allaha ma lakum min ilahin ghayruhuafala tattaqoon

data.textUthmani: وَقَالَ ٱلْمَلَأُ مِن قَوْمِهِ ٱلَّذِينَ كَفَرُوا۟ وَكَذَّبُوا۟ بِلِقَآءِ ٱلْـَٔاخِرَةِ وَأَتْرَفْنَـٰهُمْ فِى ٱلْحَيَوٰةِ ٱلدُّنْيَا مَا هَـٰذَآ إِلَّا بَشَرٌ مِّثْلُكُمْ يَأْكُلُ مِمَّا تَأْكُلُونَ مِنْهُ وَيَشْرَبُ مِمَّا تَشْرَبُونَ
data.wordByWord: وَقَالَ [And said] ٱلْمَلَأُ [the chiefs] مِن [of] قَوْمِهِ [his people] ٱلَّذِينَ [who] كَفَرُوا۟ [disbelieved] وَكَذَّبُوا۟ [and denied] بِلِقَآءِ [(the) meeting] ٱلْـَٔاخِرَةِ [(of) the Hereafter] وَأَتْرَفْنَـٰهُمْ [while We had given them luxury] فِى [in] ٱلْحَيَوٰةِ [the life] ٱلدُّنْيَا [(of) the world] مَا [Not] هَـٰذَآ [(is) this] إِلَّا [but] بَشَرٌۭ [a man] مِّثْلُكُمْ [like you] يَأْكُلُ [He eats] مِمَّا [of what] تَأْكُلُونَ [you eat] مِنْهُ [[from it]] وَيَشْرَبُ [and he drinks] مِمَّا [of what] تَشْرَبُونَ [you drink]
data.transliteration: Waqala almalao min qawmihi allatheenakafaroo wakaththaboo biliqa-i al-akhiratiwaatrafnahum fee alhayati addunyama hatha illa basharun mithlukum ya/kulumimma ta/kuloona minhu wayashrabu mimma tashraboon

words.translation: while We had given them luxury

data.textUthmani: وَلَئِنْ أَطَعْتُم بَشَرًا مِّثْلَكُمْ إِنَّكُمْ إِذًا لَّخَـٰسِرُونَ
data.wordByWord: وَلَئِنْ [And surely if] أَطَعْتُم [you obey] بَشَرًۭا [a man] مِّثْلَكُمْ [like you] إِنَّكُمْ [indeed, you] إِذًۭا [then] لَّخَـٰسِرُونَ [surely (will be) losers]
data.transliteration: Wala-in ataAAtum basharan mithlakuminnakum ithan lakhasiroon

data.textUthmani: أَيَعِدُكُمْ أَنَّكُمْ إِذَا مِتُّمْ وَكُنتُمْ تُرَابًا وَعِظَـٰمًا أَنَّكُم مُّخْرَجُونَ
data.wordByWord: أَيَعِدُكُمْ [Does he promise you ] أَنَّكُمْ [that you] إِذَا [when] مِتُّمْ [you are dead] وَكُنتُمْ [and you become] تُرَابًۭا [dust] وَعِظَـٰمًا [and bones] أَنَّكُم [that you] مُّخْرَجُونَ [(will be) brought forth]
data.transliteration: AyaAAidukum annakum itha mittumwakuntum turaban waAAithaman annakummukhrajoon

data.textUthmani: ۞ هَيْهَاتَ هَيْهَاتَ لِمَا تُوعَدُونَ
data.wordByWord: ۞ هَيْهَاتَ [Far-(fetched)] هَيْهَاتَ [far-(fetched)] لِمَا [is what] تُوعَدُونَ [you are promised]
data.transliteration: Hayhata hayhata limatooAAadoon

data.textUthmani: إِنْ هِىَ إِلَّا حَيَاتُنَا ٱلدُّنْيَا نَمُوتُ وَنَحْيَا وَمَا نَحْنُ بِمَبْعُوثِينَ
data.wordByWord: إِنْ [Not] هِىَ [it] إِلَّا [(is) but] حَيَاتُنَا [our life] ٱلدُّنْيَا [(of) the world] نَمُوتُ [we die] وَنَحْيَا [and we live] وَمَا [and not] نَحْنُ [we] بِمَبْعُوثِينَ [(will be) resurrected]
data.transliteration: In hiya illa hayatunaaddunya namootu wanahya wamanahnu bimabAAootheen

data.textUthmani: إِنْ هُوَ إِلَّا رَجُلٌ ٱفْتَرَىٰ عَلَى ٱللَّهِ كَذِبًا وَمَا نَحْنُ لَهُۥ بِمُؤْمِنِينَ
data.wordByWord: إِنْ [Not] هُوَ [(is) he] إِلَّا [but] رَجُلٌ [a man] ٱفْتَرَىٰ [who (has) invented] عَلَى [about] ٱللَّهِ [Allah] كَذِبًۭا [a lie] وَمَا [and not] نَحْنُ [we] لَهُۥ [(in) him] بِمُؤْمِنِينَ [(are) believers]
data.transliteration: In huwa illa rajulun iftaraAAala Allahi kathiban wama nahnulahu bimu/mineen

data.textUthmani: قَالَ رَبِّ ٱنصُرْنِى بِمَا كَذَّبُونِ
data.wordByWord: قَالَ [He said] رَبِّ [My Lord] ٱنصُرْنِى [Help me] بِمَا [because] كَذَّبُونِ [they deny me]
data.transliteration: Qala rabbi onsurnee bimakaththaboon

data.textUthmani: قَالَ عَمَّا قَلِيلٍ لَّيُصْبِحُنَّ نَـٰدِمِينَ
data.wordByWord: قَالَ [He said] عَمَّا [After a little while] قَلِيلٍۢ [After a little while] لَّيُصْبِحُنَّ [surely they will become] نَـٰدِمِينَ [regretful]
data.transliteration: Qala AAamma qaleelin layusbihunnanadimeen

data.textUthmani: فَأَخَذَتْهُمُ ٱلصَّيْحَةُ بِٱلْحَقِّ فَجَعَلْنَـٰهُمْ غُثَآءً ۚ فَبُعْدًا لِّلْقَوْمِ ٱلظَّـٰلِمِينَ
data.wordByWord: فَأَخَذَتْهُمُ [So seized them] ٱلصَّيْحَةُ [the awful cry] بِٱلْحَقِّ [in truth] فَجَعَلْنَـٰهُمْ [and We made them] غُثَآءًۭ ۚ [(as) rubbish of dead leaves] فَبُعْدًۭا [So away] لِّلْقَوْمِ [with the people ] ٱلظَّـٰلِمِينَ [the wrongdoers]
data.transliteration: Faakhathat-humu assayhatubilhaqqi fajaAAalnahum ghuthaanfabuAAdan lilqawmi aththalimeen

data.textUthmani: ثُمَّ أَنشَأْنَا مِنۢ بَعْدِهِمْ قُرُونًا ءَاخَرِينَ
data.wordByWord: ثُمَّ [Then] أَنشَأْنَا [We produced] مِنۢ [after them] بَعْدِهِمْ [after them] قُرُونًا [a generation] ءَاخَرِينَ [another]
data.transliteration: Thumma ansha/na min baAAdihimquroonan akhareen

data.textUthmani: مَا تَسْبِقُ مِنْ أُمَّةٍ أَجَلَهَا وَمَا يَسْتَـْٔخِرُونَ
data.wordByWord: مَا [Not] تَسْبِقُ [can precede] مِنْ [any] أُمَّةٍ [nation] أَجَلَهَا [its term] وَمَا [and not] يَسْتَـْٔخِرُونَ [they (can) delay (it)]
data.transliteration: Ma tasbiqu min ommatin ajalahawama yasta/khiroon

data.textUthmani: ثُمَّ أَرْسَلْنَا رُسُلَنَا تَتْرَا ۖ كُلَّ مَا جَآءَ أُمَّةً رَّسُولُهَا كَذَّبُوهُ ۚ فَأَتْبَعْنَا بَعْضَهُم بَعْضًا وَجَعَلْنَـٰهُمْ أَحَادِيثَ ۚ فَبُعْدًا لِّقَوْمٍ لَّا يُؤْمِنُونَ
data.wordByWord: ثُمَّ [Then] أَرْسَلْنَا [We sent] رُسُلَنَا [Our Messengers] تَتْرَا ۖ [(in) succession] كُلَّ [Every time] مَا [Every time] جَآءَ [came] أُمَّةًۭ [(to) a nation] رَّسُولُهَا [its Messenger] كَذَّبُوهُ ۚ [they denied him] فَأَتْبَعْنَا [so We made (them) follow ] بَعْضَهُم [some of them] بَعْضًۭا [others] وَجَعَلْنَـٰهُمْ [and We made them] أَحَادِيثَ ۚ [narrations] فَبُعْدًۭا [So away] لِّقَوْمٍۢ [with a people ] لَّا [not] يُؤْمِنُونَ [they believe]
data.transliteration: Thumma arsalna rusulana tatrakulla ma jaa ommatan rasooluha kaththaboohufaatbaAAna baAAdahum baAAdan wajaAAalnahumahadeetha fabuAAdan liqawmin la yu/minoon

data.textUthmani: ثُمَّ أَرْسَلْنَا مُوسَىٰ وَأَخَاهُ هَـٰرُونَ بِـَٔايَـٰتِنَا وَسُلْطَـٰنٍ مُّبِينٍ
data.wordByWord: ثُمَّ [Then] أَرْسَلْنَا [We sent] مُوسَىٰ [Musa] وَأَخَاهُ [and his brother] هَـٰرُونَ [Harun] بِـَٔايَـٰتِنَا [with Our Signs] وَسُلْطَـٰنٍۢ [and an authority] مُّبِينٍ [clear]
data.transliteration: Thumma arsalna moosa waakhahuharoona bi-ayatina wasultaninmubeen

data.textUthmani: إِلَىٰ فِرْعَوْنَ وَمَلَإِي۟هِۦ فَٱسْتَكْبَرُوا۟ وَكَانُوا۟ قَوْمًا عَالِينَ
data.wordByWord: إِلَىٰ [To] فِرْعَوْنَ [Firaun] وَمَلَإِي۟هِۦ [and his chiefs] فَٱسْتَكْبَرُوا۟ [but they behaved arrogantly] وَكَانُوا۟ [and they were] قَوْمًا [a people] عَالِينَ [haughty]
data.transliteration: Ila firAAawna wamala-ihi fastakbaroowakanoo qawman AAaleen

data.textUthmani: فَقَالُوٓا۟ أَنُؤْمِنُ لِبَشَرَيْنِ مِثْلِنَا وَقَوْمُهُمَا لَنَا عَـٰبِدُونَ
data.wordByWord: فَقَالُوٓا۟ [Then they said] أَنُؤْمِنُ [Shall we believe] لِبَشَرَيْنِ [(in) two men] مِثْلِنَا [like ourselves] وَقَوْمُهُمَا [while their people] لَنَا [for us] عَـٰبِدُونَ [(are) slaves]
data.transliteration: Faqaloo anu/minu libasharayni mithlinawaqawmuhuma lana AAabidoon

data.textUthmani: فَكَذَّبُوهُمَا فَكَانُوا۟ مِنَ ٱلْمُهْلَكِينَ
data.wordByWord: فَكَذَّبُوهُمَا [So they denied them] فَكَانُوا۟ [and they became] مِنَ [of] ٱلْمُهْلَكِينَ [those who were destroyed]
data.transliteration: Fakaththaboohuma fakanoomina almuhlakeen

data.textUthmani: وَلَقَدْ ءَاتَيْنَا مُوسَى ٱلْكِتَـٰبَ لَعَلَّهُمْ يَهْتَدُونَ
data.wordByWord: وَلَقَدْ [And verily] ءَاتَيْنَا [We gave] مُوسَى [Musa] ٱلْكِتَـٰبَ [the Scripture] لَعَلَّهُمْ [so that they may] يَهْتَدُونَ [be guided]
data.transliteration: Walaqad atayna moosaalkitaba laAAallahum yahtadoon

data.textUthmani: وَجَعَلْنَا ٱبْنَ مَرْيَمَ وَأُمَّهُۥٓ ءَايَةً وَءَاوَيْنَـٰهُمَآ إِلَىٰ رَبْوَةٍ ذَاتِ قَرَارٍ وَمَعِينٍ
data.wordByWord: وَجَعَلْنَا [And We made] ٱبْنَ [(the) son] مَرْيَمَ [(of) Maryam] وَأُمَّهُۥٓ [and his mother] ءَايَةًۭ [a Sign] وَءَاوَيْنَـٰهُمَآ [and We sheltered them] إِلَىٰ [to] رَبْوَةٍۢ [a high ground] ذَاتِ [of tranquility] قَرَارٍۢ [of tranquility] وَمَعِينٍۢ [and water springs]
data.transliteration: WajaAAalna ibna maryama waommahu ayatanwaawaynahuma ila rabwatin thatiqararin wamaAAeen

data.textUthmani: يَـٰٓأَيُّهَا ٱلرُّسُلُ كُلُوا۟ مِنَ ٱلطَّيِّبَـٰتِ وَٱعْمَلُوا۟ صَـٰلِحًا ۖ إِنِّى بِمَا تَعْمَلُونَ عَلِيمٌ
data.wordByWord: يَـٰٓأَيُّهَا [O Messengers] ٱلرُّسُلُ [O Messengers] كُلُوا۟ [Eat] مِنَ [of] ٱلطَّيِّبَـٰتِ [the good things] وَٱعْمَلُوا۟ [and do] صَـٰلِحًا ۖ [righteous (deeds)] إِنِّى [Indeed, I Am] بِمَا [of what] تَعْمَلُونَ [you do] عَلِيمٌۭ [All-Knower]
data.transliteration: Ya ayyuha arrusulukuloo mina attayyibati waAAmaloo salihaninnee bima taAAmaloona AAaleem

data.textUthmani: وَإِنَّ هَـٰذِهِۦٓ أُمَّتُكُمْ أُمَّةً وَٰحِدَةً وَأَنَا۠ رَبُّكُمْ فَٱتَّقُونِ
data.wordByWord: وَإِنَّ [And indeed] هَـٰذِهِۦٓ [this] أُمَّتُكُمْ [your religion] أُمَّةًۭ [(is) religion] وَٰحِدَةًۭ [one] وَأَنَا۠ [And I Am] رَبُّكُمْ [your Lord] فَٱتَّقُونِ [so fear Me]
data.transliteration: Wa-inna hathihi ommatukum ommatan wahidatanwaana rabbukum fattaqoon

data.textUthmani: فَتَقَطَّعُوٓا۟ أَمْرَهُم بَيْنَهُمْ زُبُرًا ۖ كُلُّ حِزْبٍۭ بِمَا لَدَيْهِمْ فَرِحُونَ
data.wordByWord: فَتَقَطَّعُوٓا۟ [But they cut off] أَمْرَهُم [their affair (of unity)] بَيْنَهُمْ [between them] زُبُرًۭا ۖ [(into) sects] كُلُّ [each] حِزْبٍۭ [faction] بِمَا [in what] لَدَيْهِمْ [they have] فَرِحُونَ [rejoicing]
data.transliteration: FataqattaAAoo amrahum baynahumzuburan kullu hizbin bima ladayhim farihoon

data.textUthmani: فَذَرْهُمْ فِى غَمْرَتِهِمْ حَتَّىٰ حِينٍ
data.wordByWord: فَذَرْهُمْ [So leave them] فِى [in] غَمْرَتِهِمْ [their confusion] حَتَّىٰ [until] حِينٍ [a time]
data.transliteration: Fatharhum fee ghamratihim hattaheen

data.textUthmani: أَيَحْسَبُونَ أَنَّمَا نُمِدُّهُم بِهِۦ مِن مَّالٍ وَبَنِينَ
data.wordByWord: أَيَحْسَبُونَ [Do they think] أَنَّمَا [that what] نُمِدُّهُم [We extend to them] بِهِۦ [[with it]] مِن [of] مَّالٍۢ [wealth] وَبَنِينَ [and children]
data.transliteration: Ayahsaboona annama numidduhumbihi min malin wabaneen

data.textUthmani: نُسَارِعُ لَهُمْ فِى ٱلْخَيْرَٰتِ ۚ بَل لَّا يَشْعُرُونَ
data.wordByWord: نُسَارِعُ [We hasten] لَهُمْ [to them] فِى [in] ٱلْخَيْرَٰتِ ۚ [the good] بَل [Nay] لَّا [not] يَشْعُرُونَ [they perceive]
data.transliteration: NusariAAu lahum fee alkhayratibal la yashAAuroon

data.textUthmani: إِنَّ ٱلَّذِينَ هُم مِّنْ خَشْيَةِ رَبِّهِم مُّشْفِقُونَ
data.wordByWord: إِنَّ [Indeed] ٱلَّذِينَ [those who] هُم [[they]] مِّنْ [from] خَشْيَةِ [(the) fear] رَبِّهِم [(of) their Lord] مُّشْفِقُونَ [(are) cautious]
data.transliteration: Inna allatheena hum min khashyatirabbihim mushfiqoon

data.textUthmani: وَٱلَّذِينَ هُم بِـَٔايَـٰتِ رَبِّهِمْ يُؤْمِنُونَ
data.wordByWord: وَٱلَّذِينَ [And those] هُم [[they]] بِـَٔايَـٰتِ [in (the) Signs] رَبِّهِمْ [(of) their Lord] يُؤْمِنُونَ [believe]
data.transliteration: Wallatheena hum bi-ayatirabbihim yu/minoon

data.textUthmani: وَٱلَّذِينَ هُم بِرَبِّهِمْ لَا يُشْرِكُونَ
data.wordByWord: وَٱلَّذِينَ [And those] هُم [[they]] بِرَبِّهِمْ [with their Lord] لَا [(do) not] يُشْرِكُونَ [associate partners]
data.transliteration: Wallatheena hum birabbihim layushrikoon

data.textUthmani: وَٱلَّذِينَ يُؤْتُونَ مَآ ءَاتَوا۟ وَّقُلُوبُهُمْ وَجِلَةٌ أَنَّهُمْ إِلَىٰ رَبِّهِمْ رَٰجِعُونَ
data.wordByWord: وَٱلَّذِينَ [And those who] يُؤْتُونَ [give] مَآ [what] ءَاتَوا۟ [they give] وَّقُلُوبُهُمْ [while their hearts] وَجِلَةٌ [(are) fearful] أَنَّهُمْ [because they] إِلَىٰ [to] رَبِّهِمْ [their Lord] رَٰجِعُونَ [(will) return]
data.transliteration: Wallatheena yu/toona maataw waquloobuhum wajilatun annahum ila rabbihim rajiAAoon

data.textUthmani: أُو۟لَـٰٓئِكَ يُسَـٰرِعُونَ فِى ٱلْخَيْرَٰتِ وَهُمْ لَهَا سَـٰبِقُونَ
data.wordByWord: أُو۟لَـٰٓئِكَ [(It is) those] يُسَـٰرِعُونَ [who hasten] فِى [in] ٱلْخَيْرَٰتِ [the good (deeds)] وَهُمْ [and they] لَهَا [in them] سَـٰبِقُونَ [(are) foremost]
data.transliteration: Ola-ika yusariAAoona feealkhayrati wahum laha sabiqoon

data.textUthmani: وَلَا نُكَلِّفُ نَفْسًا إِلَّا وُسْعَهَا ۖ وَلَدَيْنَا كِتَـٰبٌ يَنطِقُ بِٱلْحَقِّ ۚ وَهُمْ لَا يُظْلَمُونَ
data.wordByWord: وَلَا [And not] نُكَلِّفُ [We burden] نَفْسًا [any soul] إِلَّا [except] وُسْعَهَا ۖ [(to) its capacity] وَلَدَيْنَا [and with Us] كِتَـٰبٌۭ [(is) a Record] يَنطِقُ [(which) speaks] بِٱلْحَقِّ ۚ [with the truth] وَهُمْ [and they] لَا [(will) not] يُظْلَمُونَ [be wronged]
data.transliteration: Wala nukallifu nafsan illawusAAaha waladayna kitabun yantiqu bilhaqqiwahum la yuthlamoon

data.textUthmani: بَلْ قُلُوبُهُمْ فِى غَمْرَةٍ مِّنْ هَـٰذَا وَلَهُمْ أَعْمَـٰلٌ مِّن دُونِ ذَٰلِكَ هُمْ لَهَا عَـٰمِلُونَ
data.wordByWord: بَلْ [Nay] قُلُوبُهُمْ [their hearts] فِى [(are) in] غَمْرَةٍۢ [confusion] مِّنْ [over] هَـٰذَا [this] وَلَهُمْ [and for them] أَعْمَـٰلٌۭ [(are) deeds] مِّن [besides] دُونِ [besides] ذَٰلِكَ [that] هُمْ [they] لَهَا [for it] عَـٰمِلُونَ [(are) doers]
data.transliteration: Bal quloobuhum fee ghamratin min hathawalahum aAAmalun min dooni thalika hum lahaAAamiloon

data.textUthmani: حَتَّىٰٓ إِذَآ أَخَذْنَا مُتْرَفِيهِم بِٱلْعَذَابِ إِذَا هُمْ يَجْـَٔرُونَ
data.wordByWord: حَتَّىٰٓ [Until] إِذَآ [when] أَخَذْنَا [We seize] مُتْرَفِيهِم [their affluent ones] بِٱلْعَذَابِ [with the punishment] إِذَا [behold] هُمْ [They] يَجْـَٔرُونَ [cry for help]
data.transliteration: Hatta itha akhathnamutrafeehim bilAAathabi itha hum yaj-aroon

data.textUthmani: لَا تَجْـَٔرُوا۟ ٱلْيَوْمَ ۖ إِنَّكُم مِّنَّا لَا تُنصَرُونَ
data.wordByWord: لَا [(Do) not] تَجْـَٔرُوا۟ [cry for help] ٱلْيَوْمَ ۖ [today] إِنَّكُم [Indeed, you] مِّنَّا [from Us] لَا [not] تُنصَرُونَ [will be helped]
data.transliteration: La taj-aroo alyawma innakum minnala tunsaroon

data.textUthmani: قَدْ كَانَتْ ءَايَـٰتِى تُتْلَىٰ عَلَيْكُمْ فَكُنتُمْ عَلَىٰٓ أَعْقَـٰبِكُمْ تَنكِصُونَ
data.wordByWord: قَدْ [Verily] كَانَتْ [were] ءَايَـٰتِى [My Verses] تُتْلَىٰ [recited] عَلَيْكُمْ [to you] فَكُنتُمْ [but you used] عَلَىٰٓ [(to) on] أَعْقَـٰبِكُمْ [your heels] تَنكِصُونَ [turn back]
data.transliteration: Qad kanat ayatee tutlaAAalaykum fakuntum AAala aAAqabikum tankisoon

data.textUthmani: مُسْتَكْبِرِينَ بِهِۦ سَـٰمِرًا تَهْجُرُونَ
data.wordByWord: مُسْتَكْبِرِينَ [(Being) arrogant] بِهِۦ [about it] سَـٰمِرًۭا [conversing by night] تَهْجُرُونَ [speaking evil]
data.transliteration: Mustakbireena bihi samiran tahjuroon

data.textUthmani: أَفَلَمْ يَدَّبَّرُوا۟ ٱلْقَوْلَ أَمْ جَآءَهُم مَّا لَمْ يَأْتِ ءَابَآءَهُمُ ٱلْأَوَّلِينَ
data.wordByWord: أَفَلَمْ [Then, do not] يَدَّبَّرُوا۟ [they ponder] ٱلْقَوْلَ [the Word] أَمْ [or] جَآءَهُم [has come to them] مَّا [what] لَمْ [not] يَأْتِ [(had) come] ءَابَآءَهُمُ [(to) their forefathers] ٱلْأَوَّلِينَ [(to) their forefathers]
data.transliteration: Afalam yaddabbaroo alqawla am jaahumma lam ya/ti abaahumu al-awwaleen

data.textUthmani: أَمْ لَمْ يَعْرِفُوا۟ رَسُولَهُمْ فَهُمْ لَهُۥ مُنكِرُونَ
data.wordByWord: أَمْ [Or] لَمْ [(do) not] يَعْرِفُوا۟ [they recognize] رَسُولَهُمْ [their Messenger] فَهُمْ [so they] لَهُۥ [(are) rejecting him] مُنكِرُونَ [(are) rejecting him]
data.transliteration: Am lam yaAArifoo rasoolahum fahum lahumunkiroon

data.textUthmani: أَمْ يَقُولُونَ بِهِۦ جِنَّةٌۢ ۚ بَلْ جَآءَهُم بِٱلْحَقِّ وَأَكْثَرُهُمْ لِلْحَقِّ كَـٰرِهُونَ
data.wordByWord: أَمْ [Or] يَقُولُونَ [they say] بِهِۦ [In him] جِنَّةٌۢ ۚ [(is) madness] بَلْ [Nay] جَآءَهُم [he brought them] بِٱلْحَقِّ [the truth] وَأَكْثَرُهُمْ [but most of them] لِلْحَقِّ [to the truth] كَـٰرِهُونَ [(are) averse]
data.transliteration: Am yaqooloona bihi jinnatun bal jaahumbilhaqqi waaktharuhum lilhaqqi karihoon

data.textUthmani: وَلَوِ ٱتَّبَعَ ٱلْحَقُّ أَهْوَآءَهُمْ لَفَسَدَتِ ٱلسَّمَـٰوَٰتُ وَٱلْأَرْضُ وَمَن فِيهِنَّ ۚ بَلْ أَتَيْنَـٰهُم بِذِكْرِهِمْ فَهُمْ عَن ذِكْرِهِم مُّعْرِضُونَ
data.wordByWord: وَلَوِ [But if] ٱتَّبَعَ [(had) followed] ٱلْحَقُّ [the truth] أَهْوَآءَهُمْ [their desires] لَفَسَدَتِ [surely (would) have been corrupted] ٱلسَّمَـٰوَٰتُ [the heavens] وَٱلْأَرْضُ [and the earth] وَمَن [and whoever] فِيهِنَّ ۚ [(is) therein] بَلْ [Nay] أَتَيْنَـٰهُم [We have brought them] بِذِكْرِهِمْ [their reminder] فَهُمْ [but they] عَن [from] ذِكْرِهِم [their reminder] مُّعْرِضُونَ [(are) turning away]
data.transliteration: Walawi ittabaAAa alhaqqu ahwaahumlafasadati assamawatu wal-arduwaman feehinna bal ataynahum bithikrihim fahum AAanthikrihim muAAridoon

data.textUthmani: أَمْ تَسْـَٔلُهُمْ خَرْجًا فَخَرَاجُ رَبِّكَ خَيْرٌ ۖ وَهُوَ خَيْرُ ٱلرَّٰزِقِينَ
data.wordByWord: أَمْ [Or] تَسْـَٔلُهُمْ [you ask them] خَرْجًۭا [(for) a payment] فَخَرَاجُ [But the payment] رَبِّكَ [(of) your Lord] خَيْرٌۭ ۖ [(is) best] وَهُوَ [and He] خَيْرُ [(is) the Best] ٱلرَّٰزِقِينَ [(of) the Providers]
data.transliteration: Am tas-aluhum kharjan fakharajurabbika khayrun wahuwa khayru arraziqeen

data.textUthmani: وَإِنَّكَ لَتَدْعُوهُمْ إِلَىٰ صِرَٰطٍ مُّسْتَقِيمٍ
data.wordByWord: وَإِنَّكَ [And indeed, you] لَتَدْعُوهُمْ [certainly call them] إِلَىٰ [to] صِرَٰطٍۢ [(the) Path] مُّسْتَقِيمٍۢ [Straight]
data.transliteration: Wa-innaka latadAAoohum ila siratinmustaqeem

data.textUthmani: وَإِنَّ ٱلَّذِينَ لَا يُؤْمِنُونَ بِٱلْـَٔاخِرَةِ عَنِ ٱلصِّرَٰطِ لَنَـٰكِبُونَ
data.wordByWord: وَإِنَّ [And indeed] ٱلَّذِينَ [those who] لَا [(do) not] يُؤْمِنُونَ [believe] بِٱلْـَٔاخِرَةِ [in the Hereafter] عَنِ [from] ٱلصِّرَٰطِ [the path] لَنَـٰكِبُونَ [surely (are) deviating]
data.transliteration: Wa-inna allatheena layu/minoona bil-akhirati AAani assiratilanakiboon

data.textUthmani: ۞ وَلَوْ رَحِمْنَـٰهُمْ وَكَشَفْنَا مَا بِهِم مِّن ضُرٍّ لَّلَجُّوا۟ فِى طُغْيَـٰنِهِمْ يَعْمَهُونَ
data.wordByWord: ۞ وَلَوْ [And if] رَحِمْنَـٰهُمْ [We had mercy on them] وَكَشَفْنَا [and We removed] مَا [what] بِهِم [(was) on them] مِّن [of] ضُرٍّۢ [(the) hardship] لَّلَجُّوا۟ [surely they would persist] فِى [in] طُغْيَـٰنِهِمْ [their transgression] يَعْمَهُونَ [wandering blindly]
data.transliteration: Walaw rahimnahum wakashafnama bihim min durrin lalajjoo fee tughyanihimyaAAmahoon

data.textUthmani: وَلَقَدْ أَخَذْنَـٰهُم بِٱلْعَذَابِ فَمَا ٱسْتَكَانُوا۟ لِرَبِّهِمْ وَمَا يَتَضَرَّعُونَ
data.wordByWord: وَلَقَدْ [And verily] أَخَذْنَـٰهُم [We seized them] بِٱلْعَذَابِ [with the punishment] فَمَا [but not] ٱسْتَكَانُوا۟ [they submit] لِرَبِّهِمْ [to their Lord] وَمَا [and not] يَتَضَرَّعُونَ [they supplicate humbly]
data.transliteration: Walaqad akhathnahum bilAAathabifama istakanoo lirabbihim wama yatadarraAAoon

data.textUthmani: حَتَّىٰٓ إِذَا فَتَحْنَا عَلَيْهِم بَابًا ذَا عَذَابٍ شَدِيدٍ إِذَا هُمْ فِيهِ مُبْلِسُونَ
data.wordByWord: حَتَّىٰٓ [Until] إِذَا [when] فَتَحْنَا [We opened] عَلَيْهِم [for them] بَابًۭا [a gate] ذَا [of a punishment] عَذَابٍۢ [of a punishment] شَدِيدٍ [severe] إِذَا [behold] هُمْ [They] فِيهِ [in it] مُبْلِسُونَ [(will be in) despair]
data.transliteration: Hatta itha fatahnaAAalayhim baban tha AAathabin shadeedin ithahum feehi mublisoon

data.textUthmani: وَهُوَ ٱلَّذِىٓ أَنشَأَ لَكُمُ ٱلسَّمْعَ وَٱلْأَبْصَـٰرَ وَٱلْأَفْـِٔدَةَ ۚ قَلِيلًا مَّا تَشْكُرُونَ
data.wordByWord: وَهُوَ [And He] ٱلَّذِىٓ [(is) the One Who] أَنشَأَ [produced] لَكُمُ [for you] ٱلسَّمْعَ [the hearing] وَٱلْأَبْصَـٰرَ [and the sight] وَٱلْأَفْـِٔدَةَ ۚ [and the feeling] قَلِيلًۭا [little] مَّا [(is) what] تَشْكُرُونَ [you give thanks]
data.transliteration: Wahuwa allathee anshaa lakumu assamAAawal-absara wal-af-idata qaleelan matashkuroon

data.textUthmani: وَهُوَ ٱلَّذِى ذَرَأَكُمْ فِى ٱلْأَرْضِ وَإِلَيْهِ تُحْشَرُونَ
data.wordByWord: وَهُوَ [And He] ٱلَّذِى [(is) the One Who] ذَرَأَكُمْ [multiplied you] فِى [in] ٱلْأَرْضِ [the earth] وَإِلَيْهِ [and to Him] تُحْشَرُونَ [you will be gathered]
data.transliteration: Wahuwa allathee tharaakum feeal-ardi wa-ilayhi tuhsharoon

data.textUthmani: وَهُوَ ٱلَّذِى يُحْىِۦ وَيُمِيتُ وَلَهُ ٱخْتِلَـٰفُ ٱلَّيْلِ وَٱلنَّهَارِ ۚ أَفَلَا تَعْقِلُونَ
data.wordByWord: وَهُوَ [And He] ٱلَّذِى [(is) the One Who] يُحْىِۦ [gives life] وَيُمِيتُ [and causes death] وَلَهُ [and for Him] ٱخْتِلَـٰفُ [(is the) alternation] ٱلَّيْلِ [(of) the night] وَٱلنَّهَارِ ۚ [and the day] أَفَلَا [Then will not] تَعْقِلُونَ [you reason]
data.transliteration: Wahuwa allathee yuhyeewayumeetu walahu ikhtilafu allayli wannahariafala taAAqiloon

data.textUthmani: بَلْ قَالُوا۟ مِثْلَ مَا قَالَ ٱلْأَوَّلُونَ
data.wordByWord: بَلْ [Nay] قَالُوا۟ [they say] مِثْلَ [(the) like] مَا [(of) what] قَالَ [said] ٱلْأَوَّلُونَ [the former (people)]
data.transliteration: Bal qaloo mithla ma qalaal-awwaloon

data.textUthmani: قَالُوٓا۟ أَءِذَا مِتْنَا وَكُنَّا تُرَابًا وَعِظَـٰمًا أَءِنَّا لَمَبْعُوثُونَ
data.wordByWord: قَالُوٓا۟ [They said] أَءِذَا [What! When] مِتْنَا [we are dead] وَكُنَّا [and become] تُرَابًۭا [dust] وَعِظَـٰمًا [and bones] أَءِنَّا [would we] لَمَبْعُوثُونَ [surely be resurrected]
data.transliteration: Qaloo a-itha mitnawakunna turaban waAAithamana-inna lamabAAoothoon

data.textUthmani: لَقَدْ وُعِدْنَا نَحْنُ وَءَابَآؤُنَا هَـٰذَا مِن قَبْلُ إِنْ هَـٰذَآ إِلَّآ أَسَـٰطِيرُ ٱلْأَوَّلِينَ
data.wordByWord: لَقَدْ [Verily] وُعِدْنَا [we have been promised] نَحْنُ [[we]] وَءَابَآؤُنَا [and our forefathers] هَـٰذَا [this] مِن [before] قَبْلُ [before] إِنْ [not] هَـٰذَآ [(is) this] إِلَّآ [but] أَسَـٰطِيرُ [(the) tales] ٱلْأَوَّلِينَ [(of) the former (people)]
data.transliteration: Laqad wuAAidna nahnu waabaonahatha min qablu in hatha illa asateerual-awwaleen

data.textUthmani: قُل لِّمَنِ ٱلْأَرْضُ وَمَن فِيهَآ إِن كُنتُمْ تَعْلَمُونَ
data.wordByWord: قُل [Say] لِّمَنِ [To whom (belongs)] ٱلْأَرْضُ [the earth] وَمَن [and whoever] فِيهَآ [(is) in it] إِن [if] كُنتُمْ [you] تَعْلَمُونَ [know]
data.transliteration: Qul limani al-ardu waman feehain kuntum taAAlamoon

data.textUthmani: سَيَقُولُونَ لِلَّهِ ۚ قُلْ أَفَلَا تَذَكَّرُونَ
data.wordByWord: سَيَقُولُونَ [They will say] لِلَّهِ ۚ [To Allah] قُلْ [Say] أَفَلَا [Then will not] تَذَكَّرُونَ [you remember]
data.transliteration: Sayaqooloona lillahi qul afalatathakkaroon

data.textUthmani: قُلْ مَن رَّبُّ ٱلسَّمَـٰوَٰتِ ٱلسَّبْعِ وَرَبُّ ٱلْعَرْشِ ٱلْعَظِيمِ
data.wordByWord: قُلْ [Say] مَن [Who] رَّبُّ [(is the) Lord] ٱلسَّمَـٰوَٰتِ [(of) the seven heavens] ٱلسَّبْعِ [(of) the seven heavens] وَرَبُّ [and (the) Lord] ٱلْعَرْشِ [(of) the Throne] ٱلْعَظِيمِ [the Great]
data.transliteration: Qul man rabbu assamawatiassabAAi warabbu alAAarshi alAAatheem

data.textUthmani: سَيَقُولُونَ لِلَّهِ ۚ قُلْ أَفَلَا تَتَّقُونَ
data.wordByWord: سَيَقُولُونَ [They will say] لِلَّهِ ۚ [Allah] قُلْ [Say] أَفَلَا [Then will not] تَتَّقُونَ [you fear (Him)]
data.transliteration: Sayaqooloona lillahi qul afalatattaqoon

data.textUthmani: قُلْ مَنۢ بِيَدِهِۦ مَلَكُوتُ كُلِّ شَىْءٍ وَهُوَ يُجِيرُ وَلَا يُجَارُ عَلَيْهِ إِن كُنتُمْ تَعْلَمُونَ
data.wordByWord: قُلْ [Say] مَنۢ [Who is (it)] بِيَدِهِۦ [in Whose Hand(s)] مَلَكُوتُ [(is the) dominion] كُلِّ [(of) all] شَىْءٍۢ [things] وَهُوَ [and He] يُجِيرُ [protects] وَلَا [and no (one)] يُجَارُ [(can) be protected] عَلَيْهِ [against Him] إِن [If] كُنتُمْ [you] تَعْلَمُونَ [know]
data.transliteration: Qul man biyadihi malakootu kulli shay-inwahuwa yujeeru wala yujaru AAalayhi in kuntumtaAAlamoon

data.textUthmani: سَيَقُولُونَ لِلَّهِ ۚ قُلْ فَأَنَّىٰ تُسْحَرُونَ
data.wordByWord: سَيَقُولُونَ [They will say] لِلَّهِ ۚ [Allah] قُلْ [Say] فَأَنَّىٰ [Then how] تُسْحَرُونَ [are you deluded]
data.transliteration: Sayaqooloona lillahi qul faannatusharoon

data.textUthmani: بَلْ أَتَيْنَـٰهُم بِٱلْحَقِّ وَإِنَّهُمْ لَكَـٰذِبُونَ
data.wordByWord: بَلْ [Nay] أَتَيْنَـٰهُم [We (have) brought them] بِٱلْحَقِّ [the truth] وَإِنَّهُمْ [but indeed, they] لَكَـٰذِبُونَ [surely, (are) liars]
data.transliteration: Bal ataynahum bilhaqqiwa-innahum lakathiboon

data.textUthmani: مَا ٱتَّخَذَ ٱللَّهُ مِن وَلَدٍ وَمَا كَانَ مَعَهُۥ مِنْ إِلَـٰهٍ ۚ إِذًا لَّذَهَبَ كُلُّ إِلَـٰهٍۭ بِمَا خَلَقَ وَلَعَلَا بَعْضُهُمْ عَلَىٰ بَعْضٍ ۚ سُبْحَـٰنَ ٱللَّهِ عَمَّا يَصِفُونَ
data.wordByWord: مَا [Not] ٱتَّخَذَ [Allah has taken] ٱللَّهُ [Allah has taken] مِن [any] وَلَدٍۢ [son] وَمَا [and not] كَانَ [is] مَعَهُۥ [with Him] مِنْ [any] إِلَـٰهٍ ۚ [god] إِذًۭا [Then] لَّذَهَبَ [surely (would have) taken away] كُلُّ [each] إِلَـٰهٍۭ [god] بِمَا [what] خَلَقَ [he created] وَلَعَلَا [and surely would have overpowered] بَعْضُهُمْ [some of them] عَلَىٰ [[on]] بَعْضٍۢ ۚ [others] سُبْحَـٰنَ [Glory be] ٱللَّهِ [(to) Allah] عَمَّا [above what] يَصِفُونَ [they attribute]
data.transliteration: Ma ittakhatha Allahumin waladin wama kana maAAahu min ilahin ithanlathahaba kullu ilahin bima khalaqa walaAAalabaAAduhum AAala baAAdin subhana AllahiAAamma yasifoon

data.textUthmani: عَـٰلِمِ ٱلْغَيْبِ وَٱلشَّهَـٰدَةِ فَتَعَـٰلَىٰ عَمَّا يُشْرِكُونَ
data.wordByWord: عَـٰلِمِ [Knower] ٱلْغَيْبِ [(of) the unseen] وَٱلشَّهَـٰدَةِ [and the witnessed] فَتَعَـٰلَىٰ [exalted is He] عَمَّا [above what] يُشْرِكُونَ [they associate]
data.transliteration: AAalimi alghaybi washshahadatifataAAala AAamma yushrikoon

data.textUthmani: قُل رَّبِّ إِمَّا تُرِيَنِّى مَا يُوعَدُونَ
data.wordByWord: قُل [Say] رَّبِّ [My Lord] إِمَّا [If] تُرِيَنِّى [You should show me] مَا [what] يُوعَدُونَ [they are promised]
data.transliteration: Qul rabbi imma turiyannee mayooAAadoon

data.textUthmani: رَبِّ فَلَا تَجْعَلْنِى فِى ٱلْقَوْمِ ٱلظَّـٰلِمِينَ
data.wordByWord: رَبِّ [My Lord] فَلَا [then (do) not] تَجْعَلْنِى [place me] فِى [among] ٱلْقَوْمِ [the people ] ٱلظَّـٰلِمِينَ [the wrongdoers]
data.transliteration: Rabbi fala tajAAalnee fee alqawmi aththalimeen

data.textUthmani: وَإِنَّا عَلَىٰٓ أَن نُّرِيَكَ مَا نَعِدُهُمْ لَقَـٰدِرُونَ
data.wordByWord: وَإِنَّا [And indeed We] عَلَىٰٓ [on] أَن [that] نُّرِيَكَ [We show you] مَا [what] نَعِدُهُمْ [We have promised them] لَقَـٰدِرُونَ [surely able]
data.transliteration: Wa-inna AAala an nuriyaka manaAAiduhum laqadiroon

data.textUthmani: ٱدْفَعْ بِٱلَّتِى هِىَ أَحْسَنُ ٱلسَّيِّئَةَ ۚ نَحْنُ أَعْلَمُ بِمَا يَصِفُونَ
data.wordByWord: ٱدْفَعْ [Repel] بِٱلَّتِى [by that] هِىَ [which] أَحْسَنُ [(is) best ] ٱلسَّيِّئَةَ ۚ [the evil] نَحْنُ [We] أَعْلَمُ [know best] بِمَا [of what] يَصِفُونَ [they attribute]
data.transliteration: IdfaAA billatee hiya ahsanu assayyi-atanahnu aAAlamu bima yasifoon

data.textUthmani: وَقُل رَّبِّ أَعُوذُ بِكَ مِنْ هَمَزَٰتِ ٱلشَّيَـٰطِينِ
data.wordByWord: وَقُل [And say] رَّبِّ [My Lord] أَعُوذُ [I seek refuge] بِكَ [in You] مِنْ [from] هَمَزَٰتِ [(the) suggestions] ٱلشَّيَـٰطِينِ [(of) the evil ones]
data.transliteration: Waqul rabbi aAAoothu bika min hamazatiashshayateen

data.textUthmani: وَأَعُوذُ بِكَ رَبِّ أَن يَحْضُرُونِ
data.wordByWord: وَأَعُوذُ [And I seek refuge] بِكَ [in You] رَبِّ [My Lord] أَن [Lest] يَحْضُرُونِ [they be present with me]
data.transliteration: WaaAAoothu bika rabbi an yahduroon

data.textUthmani: حَتَّىٰٓ إِذَا جَآءَ أَحَدَهُمُ ٱلْمَوْتُ قَالَ رَبِّ ٱرْجِعُونِ
data.wordByWord: حَتَّىٰٓ [Until] إِذَا [when] جَآءَ [comes] أَحَدَهُمُ [(to) one of them] ٱلْمَوْتُ [the death] قَالَ [he says] رَبِّ [My Lord] ٱرْجِعُونِ [Send me back]
data.transliteration: Hatta itha jaa ahadahumualmawtu qala rabbi irjiAAoon

data.textUthmani: لَعَلِّىٓ أَعْمَلُ صَـٰلِحًا فِيمَا تَرَكْتُ ۚ كَلَّآ ۚ إِنَّهَا كَلِمَةٌ هُوَ قَآئِلُهَا ۖ وَمِن وَرَآئِهِم بَرْزَخٌ إِلَىٰ يَوْمِ يُبْعَثُونَ
data.wordByWord: لَعَلِّىٓ [That I may] أَعْمَلُ [do] صَـٰلِحًۭا [righteous (deeds)] فِيمَا [in what] تَرَكْتُ ۚ [I left behind] كَلَّآ ۚ [No] إِنَّهَا [Indeed, it] كَلِمَةٌ [(is) a word] هُوَ [he] قَآئِلُهَا ۖ [speaks it] وَمِن [and before them] وَرَآئِهِم [and before them] بَرْزَخٌ [(is) a barrier] إِلَىٰ [till] يَوْمِ [(the) Day] يُبْعَثُونَ [they are resurrected]
data.transliteration: LaAAallee aAAmalu salihanfeema taraktu kalla innaha kalimatun huwa qa-iluhawamin wara-ihim barzakhun ila yawmi yubAAathoon

data.textUthmani: فَإِذَا نُفِخَ فِى ٱلصُّورِ فَلَآ أَنسَابَ بَيْنَهُمْ يَوْمَئِذٍ وَلَا يَتَسَآءَلُونَ
data.wordByWord: فَإِذَا [So when] نُفِخَ [is blown] فِى [in] ٱلصُّورِ [the trumpet] فَلَآ [then not] أَنسَابَ [(there) will be relationship] بَيْنَهُمْ [among them] يَوْمَئِذٍۢ [that Day] وَلَا [and not] يَتَسَآءَلُونَ [will they ask each other]
data.transliteration: Fa-itha nufikha fee assoorifala ansaba baynahum yawma-ithin walayatasaaloon

data.textUthmani: فَمَن ثَقُلَتْ مَوَٰزِينُهُۥ فَأُو۟لَـٰٓئِكَ هُمُ ٱلْمُفْلِحُونَ
data.wordByWord: فَمَن [Then (the one) whose] ثَقُلَتْ [(are) heavy] مَوَٰزِينُهُۥ [his scales] فَأُو۟لَـٰٓئِكَ [then those ] هُمُ [they] ٱلْمُفْلِحُونَ [(are) the successful]
data.transliteration: Faman thaqulat mawazeenuhu faola-ikahumu almuflihoon

data.textUthmani: وَمَنْ خَفَّتْ مَوَٰزِينُهُۥ فَأُو۟لَـٰٓئِكَ ٱلَّذِينَ خَسِرُوٓا۟ أَنفُسَهُمْ فِى جَهَنَّمَ خَـٰلِدُونَ
data.wordByWord: وَمَنْ [But (the one) whose] خَفَّتْ [(are) light] مَوَٰزِينُهُۥ [his scales] فَأُو۟لَـٰٓئِكَ [then those] ٱلَّذِينَ [they [who]] خَسِرُوٓا۟ [have lost] أَنفُسَهُمْ [their souls] فِى [in] جَهَنَّمَ [Hell] خَـٰلِدُونَ [they (will) abide forever]
data.transliteration: Waman khaffat mawazeenuhu faola-ikaallatheena khasiroo anfusahum fee jahannama khalidoon

data.textUthmani: تَلْفَحُ وُجُوهَهُمُ ٱلنَّارُ وَهُمْ فِيهَا كَـٰلِحُونَ
data.wordByWord: تَلْفَحُ [Will burn] وُجُوهَهُمُ [their faces] ٱلنَّارُ [the Fire] وَهُمْ [and they] فِيهَا [in it] كَـٰلِحُونَ [(will) grin with displaced lips]
data.transliteration: Talfahu wujoohahumu annaruwahum feeha kalihoon

data.textUthmani: أَلَمْ تَكُنْ ءَايَـٰتِى تُتْلَىٰ عَلَيْكُمْ فَكُنتُم بِهَا تُكَذِّبُونَ
data.wordByWord: أَلَمْ [Were not] تَكُنْ [Were not] ءَايَـٰتِى [My Verses] تُتْلَىٰ [recited] عَلَيْكُمْ [to you] فَكُنتُم [and you used (to)] بِهَا [deny them] تُكَذِّبُونَ [deny them]
data.transliteration: Alam takun ayatee tutlaAAalaykum fakuntum biha tukaththiboon

data.textUthmani: قَالُوا۟ رَبَّنَا غَلَبَتْ عَلَيْنَا شِقْوَتُنَا وَكُنَّا قَوْمًا ضَآلِّينَ
data.wordByWord: قَالُوا۟ [They (will) say] رَبَّنَا [Our Lord] غَلَبَتْ [Overcame] عَلَيْنَا [[on] us] شِقْوَتُنَا [our wretchedness] وَكُنَّا [and we were] قَوْمًۭا [a people] ضَآلِّينَ [astray]
data.transliteration: Qaloo rabbana ghalabatAAalayna shiqwatuna wakunna qawman dalleen

data.textUthmani: رَبَّنَآ أَخْرِجْنَا مِنْهَا فَإِنْ عُدْنَا فَإِنَّا ظَـٰلِمُونَ
data.wordByWord: رَبَّنَآ [Our Lord] أَخْرِجْنَا [Bring us out] مِنْهَا [from it] فَإِنْ [then if] عُدْنَا [we return] فَإِنَّا [then indeed, we] ظَـٰلِمُونَ [(would be) wrongdoers]
data.transliteration: Rabbana akhrijna minhafa-in AAudna fa-inna thalimoon

data.textUthmani: قَالَ ٱخْسَـُٔوا۟ فِيهَا وَلَا تُكَلِّمُونِ
data.wordByWord: قَالَ [He (will) say] ٱخْسَـُٔوا۟ [Remain despised] فِيهَا [in it] وَلَا [and (do) not] تُكَلِّمُونِ [speak to Me]
data.transliteration: Qala ikhsaoo feeha walatukallimoon

data.textUthmani: إِنَّهُۥ كَانَ فَرِيقٌ مِّنْ عِبَادِى يَقُولُونَ رَبَّنَآ ءَامَنَّا فَٱغْفِرْ لَنَا وَٱرْحَمْنَا وَأَنتَ خَيْرُ ٱلرَّٰحِمِينَ
data.wordByWord: إِنَّهُۥ [Indeed] كَانَ [(there) was] فَرِيقٌۭ [a party] مِّنْ [of] عِبَادِى [My slaves] يَقُولُونَ [(who) said] رَبَّنَآ [Our Lord] ءَامَنَّا [We believe] فَٱغْفِرْ [so forgive] لَنَا [us] وَٱرْحَمْنَا [and have mercy on us] وَأَنتَ [and You] خَيْرُ [(are) best] ٱلرَّٰحِمِينَ [(of) those who show mercy]
data.transliteration: Innahu kana fareequn min AAibadeeyaqooloona rabbana amanna faghfirlana warhamna waanta khayru arrahimeen

data.textUthmani: فَٱتَّخَذْتُمُوهُمْ سِخْرِيًّا حَتَّىٰٓ أَنسَوْكُمْ ذِكْرِى وَكُنتُم مِّنْهُمْ تَضْحَكُونَ
data.wordByWord: فَٱتَّخَذْتُمُوهُمْ [But you took them] سِخْرِيًّا [(in) mockery] حَتَّىٰٓ [until] أَنسَوْكُمْ [they made you forget] ذِكْرِى [My remembrance] وَكُنتُم [and you used (to)] مِّنْهُمْ [at them] تَضْحَكُونَ [laugh]
data.transliteration: Fattakhathtumoohumsikhriyyan hatta ansawkum thikree wakuntumminhum tadhakoon

data.textUthmani: إِنِّى جَزَيْتُهُمُ ٱلْيَوْمَ بِمَا صَبَرُوٓا۟ أَنَّهُمْ هُمُ ٱلْفَآئِزُونَ
data.wordByWord: إِنِّى [Indeed, I] جَزَيْتُهُمُ [have rewarded them] ٱلْيَوْمَ [this Day] بِمَا [because] صَبَرُوٓا۟ [they were patient] أَنَّهُمْ [indeed, they] هُمُ [[they]] ٱلْفَآئِزُونَ [(are) the successful ones]
data.transliteration: Innee jazaytuhumu alyawma bima sabarooannahum humu alfa-izoon

data.textUthmani: قَـٰلَ كَمْ لَبِثْتُمْ فِى ٱلْأَرْضِ عَدَدَ سِنِينَ
data.wordByWord: قَـٰلَ [He will say] كَمْ [How long] لَبِثْتُمْ [did you remain] فِى [in] ٱلْأَرْضِ [the earth] عَدَدَ [(in) number] سِنِينَ [(of) years]
data.transliteration: Qala kam labithtum fee al-ardiAAadada sineen

data.textUthmani: قَالُوا۟ لَبِثْنَا يَوْمًا أَوْ بَعْضَ يَوْمٍ فَسْـَٔلِ ٱلْعَآدِّينَ
data.wordByWord: قَالُوا۟ [They will say] لَبِثْنَا [We remained] يَوْمًا [a day] أَوْ [or] بَعْضَ [a part] يَوْمٍۢ [(of) a day] فَسْـَٔلِ [but ask] ٱلْعَآدِّينَ [those who keep count]
data.transliteration: Qaloo labithna yawman aw baAAdayawmin fas-ali alAAaddeen

data.textUthmani: قَـٰلَ إِن لَّبِثْتُمْ إِلَّا قَلِيلًا ۖ لَّوْ أَنَّكُمْ كُنتُمْ تَعْلَمُونَ
data.wordByWord: قَـٰلَ [He will say] إِن [Not] لَّبِثْتُمْ [you stayed] إِلَّا [but] قَلِيلًۭا ۖ [a little] لَّوْ [if] أَنَّكُمْ [only you] كُنتُمْ [[you]] تَعْلَمُونَ [knew]
data.transliteration: Qala in labithtum illaqaleelan law annakum kuntum taAAlamoon

data.textUthmani: أَفَحَسِبْتُمْ أَنَّمَا خَلَقْنَـٰكُمْ عَبَثًا وَأَنَّكُمْ إِلَيْنَا لَا تُرْجَعُونَ
data.wordByWord: أَفَحَسِبْتُمْ [Then did you think] أَنَّمَا [that] خَلَقْنَـٰكُمْ [We created you] عَبَثًۭا [uselessly] وَأَنَّكُمْ [and that you] إِلَيْنَا [to Us] لَا [not] تُرْجَعُونَ [will be returned]
data.transliteration: Afahasibtum annama khalaqnakumAAabathan waannakum ilayna la turjaAAoon

data.textUthmani: فَتَعَـٰلَى ٱللَّهُ ٱلْمَلِكُ ٱلْحَقُّ ۖ لَآ إِلَـٰهَ إِلَّا هُوَ رَبُّ ٱلْعَرْشِ ٱلْكَرِيمِ
data.wordByWord: فَتَعَـٰلَى [So exalted is] ٱللَّهُ [Allah] ٱلْمَلِكُ [the King] ٱلْحَقُّ ۖ [the Truth] لَآ [(There is) no] إِلَـٰهَ [god] إِلَّا [except] هُوَ [Him] رَبُّ [(the) Lord] ٱلْعَرْشِ [(of) the Throne] ٱلْكَرِيمِ [Honorable]
data.transliteration: FataAAala Allahualmaliku alhaqqu la ilaha illa huwarabbu alAAarshi alkareem

data.textUthmani: وَمَن يَدْعُ مَعَ ٱللَّهِ إِلَـٰهًا ءَاخَرَ لَا بُرْهَـٰنَ لَهُۥ بِهِۦ فَإِنَّمَا حِسَابُهُۥ عِندَ رَبِّهِۦٓ ۚ إِنَّهُۥ لَا يُفْلِحُ ٱلْكَـٰفِرُونَ
data.wordByWord: وَمَن [And whoever] يَدْعُ [invokes] مَعَ [with] ٱللَّهِ [Allah] إِلَـٰهًا [god] ءَاخَرَ [other] لَا [no] بُرْهَـٰنَ [proof] لَهُۥ [for him] بِهِۦ [in it] فَإِنَّمَا [Then only] حِسَابُهُۥ [his account] عِندَ [(is) with] رَبِّهِۦٓ ۚ [his Lord] إِنَّهُۥ [Indeed, [he]] لَا [not] يُفْلِحُ [will succeed] ٱلْكَـٰفِرُونَ [the disbelievers]
data.transliteration: Waman yadAAu maAAa Allahi ilahanakhara la burhana lahu bihi fa-innamahisabuhu AAinda rabbihi innahu la yuflihualkafiroon

data.textUthmani: وَقُل رَّبِّ ٱغْفِرْ وَٱرْحَمْ وَأَنتَ خَيْرُ ٱلرَّٰحِمِينَ
data.wordByWord: وَقُل [And say] رَّبِّ [My Lord] ٱغْفِرْ [Forgive] وَٱرْحَمْ [and have mercy] وَأَنتَ [and You] خَيْرُ [(are the) Best] ٱلرَّٰحِمِينَ [(of) those who show mercy]
data.transliteration: Waqul rabbi ighfir warhamwaanta khayru arrahimeen
